code: import React from"react";import{useRef}from'react';import emailjs from'@emailjs/browser';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Contact(){const form=useRef();const sendEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('react_contact_portfolio','React Contact Form',form.current,'7lg6x-BWHcIfBQDMt').then(result=>{console.log(result.text);console.log("message sent");form.current.reset();window.alert('Votre e-mail a été envoyé avec succès');},error=>{console.log(error.text);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contact",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,action:"#",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dbl-field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",placeholder:"Renseigner votre nom",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_email",placeholder:"Renseigner votre adresse mail",required:true})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",placeholder:"R\xE9diger votre message",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-area",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Envoyer"})})]})]})});}export default Contact;
